lead_paragraph: Pakistan fast bowler Mohammad Amir, who spent time in jail and served a five-year ban for spot-fixing, will play for English county Essex next season, the club said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Pakistan's Amir to Join English County Essex in 2017
headline.main: Pakistan's Amir to Join English County Essex in 2017
